articles.description: Instantly losing in the first round might be the way to go if you’re looking to level up Fall Guys newest free-to-play battle pass, according to members of the community who have been taking a dive.
articles.content: A week ago, Fall Guys took a major step, going free-to-play while also launching for the first time on Nintendo Switch and Xbox consoles (alongside existing PlayStation and PC players). But it seems … [+1753 chars]

articles.author: Rob Rich
articles.title: Tim Cook Just Teased Apple's Next Big Device - SlashGear
articles.description: Tim Cook spoke in an interview not long after WWDC 2022 about the future of Apple software development and the company's expansion into more AR-related tech.
articles.content: Apple breaking into the augmented reality market could have a huge impact on AR and VR as a whole. Kuo believes the tech giant's new headset, which he describes as a "game changer" would demand a res… [+1407 chars]

articles.title: Tesla CarPlay workaround now supports browsers in each model - 9to5Mac
